thread.title: Bauhaus Furniture expands its production capacity in Ripley
thread.title_full: Bauhaus Furniture expands its production capacity in Ripley - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Bauhaus Furniture expands its production capacity in Ripley
text:
RIPLEY, Miss. (AP) - Bauhaus Furniture is expanding its production capacity.
The Northeast Mississippi Daily Journal reports ( http://bit.ly/1OEWx3z ) the Saltillo-based company said Wednesday it is investing about $1.25 million converting a distribution center in Ripley into a manufacturing space.
The 230,000-square-foot facility in the North Ripley Industrial Park has been a warehouse for Carolina Accent and Austin Furniture, two sister companies of Bauhaus.
Bauhaus President Wayne Stephens said manufacturing will begin in early November, and will start with about 20 employees.
Stephens says if the business grows, he hopes to have 175 workers at the new facility.
Bauhaus Furniture Group named Stephens president in May, and said it was looking to expand. Making good on that promise, Bauhaus, through the Tippah County Development Foundation, was able to secure about $1 million in grants and tax incentives.
Information from: Northeast Mississippi Daily Journal, http://djournal.com
